string.value: #b#m261000000##k's #b#p2111007##k seems to be concerned about something. What must that be? I better go ses #p2111007#.

#p2111007# said recently, someone purchased an inordinate amount of jewels and machinery, so much so that he wanted to make sure who that person might be that made the massive order. These items seemed to have been shipped to #b#m100030000##k...

At #m100030000#, I saw a tree entrance that had not been seen before. It looked like an entrance to a fort... So when I tried to speak to #p1094000#, who was standing in front of the entrance, he said a new fort for #bPirate #p1072008##k is currently being built.

Business deals are all about trust. Whatever the client wants, I just deliver the goods, and that's that. At least, that's how the brokers conduct themselves, but... there comes a time where instinct takes over ethics, and this is the time. What is it that I am talking about?

Someone just purchased an #bunfathomable amount of items#k. Machines made out of finely refined steel, jewels, sources of energy made through alchemy... this is actually enough to start a war. That's why I am very much concerned...

Who exactly would need that many resources? That's what I want you to find out. It might be just a senseless splurging of a billionaire, but... if it's really a war, everyone in the world of Maple will be in danger...

These resources have been shipped to #b#m100030000##k. Go check and see who made this outrageous offer, and if they seem dangerous, then come back and let me know. If nothing seems to be going on, then never mind.
Is that a no? Hmm... you must not care much about the safety of others.

Who is this? State your name and rank! I, #p1094000#, will be protecting #bNautilus#k and #b#p1072008##k! Remember the name of the hero of all pirates, #p1094000#! Ahahahahah! Wait, this isn't it. When did you start changing up the tactics? But I won't fall for your petty adjustments.

...huh? What? You're just here to see what's going on because you heard something suspicious is going on here? Hmm... why didn't you tell me that beforehand. We aren't suspicious people. We're just pirates. Don't think just because we're pirates, we'll be stealing things from others like Lord Pirate, okay?

We got on board to Nautilus, following our captain #p1072008# along as we circle around the water that surrounds the world of Maple, searching for clues on the whereabouts of Black Magician. We're armed with knuckles and guns, and we're ready to put an end to the source of darkness once and for all.

Like all the wise men in Victoria Island still training after all these years to sufficiently combat the day when Black Magician is reborn, #p1072008# has been tirelessly working to combat the evil. Quite amazing for someone that young.
Anyway, quit your worrying! We're not like that. I promise you, in the name of #p1072008#, that we will not attack you one bit.

I can't show you the whole thing since we haven't fully set up yet, but since we'll all be on the same boat in the near future, you can expect great things coming from us. If you desire to become #ba hero in sea level#k with #p1072008#, come see me.
Have you not gone to #b#m100030000##k yet? Go now! No time to wait! Seriously, without any money transactions, nothing seem to go right...
